text: The 1915 Kentucky gubernatorial election was held on November 2, 1915. Democratic nominee Augustus Owsley Stanley defeated Republican nominee Edwin P. Morrow with 49.06% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Augustus Owsley Stanley, Democratic *Edwin P. Morrow, Republican Other candidates *L. L. Pickett, Prohibition *Charles Dobbs, Socialist *Fred J. Drexler, Progressive ===Results=== ==References== 1915 Kentucky Category:1915 Kentucky elections
title: 1915 Kentucky gubernatorial election
